Text: Thanks. :) If you ever need any help with anything feel free to contact us.

Hi Ray,
Followed you on demonoid when you first started and following you on pirate bay and all I can say is thank you.  With my daughter in and out of hospitals you help us pass the time with all of your hallmark, lifetime movies you upload.  Simple act of kindness
@lovexmas, your most welcome. Just trying to share. It's alot of work, an not the best quality, but I try.
RayCort...I think the quality of your work is excellent!  Many thanks again for all of your hard work!

Thank you so much RayCort, for all the time and effort that you put into doing this for people and I think that the quality is just fine. I love all the christmas movies that you upload. Once again thank you. Happy Holidays
